casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Johnny HUNT. No. 571P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31 st day of December 2008 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

*869"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
